title: 02/22/2021 - HOUR 1 - Jimmy G, Celtics, Big Ben, Patriots
itunes:title: 02/22/2021 - HOUR 1 - Jimmy G, Celtics, Big Ben, Patriots
description:
Jimmy Garoppolo is right to welcome a trade

The Boston Celtics are too cheap and it shows

The writing seems to be on the wall for Big Ben

The Patriots should consider bringing back Cam Newton


Guest: Peter Schrager

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
